help-file.title: "GOD, ADVANCE"
help-file.content:
To promote a player to a level higher than they currently have. The default is to advance one level. A level 0 player is always only advanced by one level. *ONLY* Forgers are allowed to advance players on Duris. If you have a question regarding this ruling, please contact one of the forgers.
For a current list of the Forgers, type "wizlist"
